akn:section.akn:heading: Establishment of Visa and Passport Security Program in the Department of State

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Establishment There is established, within the Bureau of Diplomatic Security of the Department of State, the Visa and Passport Security Program (in this section referred to as the “Program”).
